analyze.definition: To examine in detail the constitution or structure of (something, especially information), typically for purposes of explanation and interpretation.
analyze.example_sentence: The scientist will analyze the data to find a new trend.
analyze.genai_image_prompt: A scientist looking at a glowing chart with data trends.

approach.definition: Come near or nearer to (someone or something) in distance or time.
approach.example_sentence: The cat will approach the bird slowly.
approach.genai_image_prompt: A cat stalking a small bird in a garden.
